alert.note: Alert for Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Nicholas, east central Kanawha, southern Clay and north central Fayette Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glen, or 13 miles southwest of Clay, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clay, Glen, Bentree, Bickmore, Swiss, Indore and Pond Gap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas
